descriptionHtml:
OPEN SOURCE (Free to take and Mod) I do not have time nor the will to finish this mod! That's for you to do!!! I will be working on a new mod sorry.

[size=3][color=#DB7900][center]Created by: Alivante[/center][/color][/size]
[size=12][color=#DB7900][center]Kong

--MOD IS STILL BEING UPDATED, THINGS CAN AND WILL CHANGE--
I hope to make a custom Island soon!
I will start the island on 3/22/14, I am learning how at this very moment.
NOW TEAM UP WITH JACK BLACK!!!
KongEX has, new location, Jack Black and more!

Located: Around POISnowy20 X, 40. Y, 17

This Mod is not Over-Powered, Kong is very hard, almost impossible to kill.

This Mod added a new NPC enemy into Skyrim!
Kong is a over-sized troll, that looks like Kong from the Movies ect.

Drops two custom items:

The Skull of Kong weights 1250 Pounds & is worth 10000 Gold; The Book of Kong teaches the Paralyze spell (Does 60 Seconds of Paralyze on most any NPC) 5 Pounds & is worth 50000 Gold.

Please check out my other Mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52121/?]Children_of_Skyrim_Followers[/url] by Alivante.[/center][/color][/size]
author: Alivante
